gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
To forget something
ali
to forget how to do something
pomeni ne spomniti se nečesa ali načina, kako je treba nekaj narediti, čeprav smo v preteklosti to vedeli.

seg.quote: She had forgotten how to ride a bicycle.

sense.def:
To forget to do something
pomeni ne spomniti se, da bi nekaj storili.

seg.quote: I meant to see her on Friday, but I forgot all about it.
I forgot to mention that John is a musician.

sense.def:
To forget something
pomeni ne spomniti se, da bi s seboj vzeli nekaj, kar smo nameravali vzeti s seboj.

seg.quote: Sorry to disturb you—I forgot my key.

sense.def:
Rečemo tudi:
someone forgets something
, kadar nekdo namenoma ne misli več na nekaj.

seg.quote: If you want my advice I think you ought to forget her.

sense.def:
To forget oneself
pomeni vesti se neobvladano ali nesprejemljivo;
